Namespace Squiggles.Core.Scenes.Utility

Classes

BGM

This singleton needs to be in the autoloads in Godot. It handles BackGround Music (BGM). It assumes only one track at a time will be playing. Any arbitrary stream can be assigned, and the cross-fade duration can be configured See also: QueueSong(AudioStream, float, bool)
